name: Spider Collider [Jam Version]
description:
-Please Download For The Best Experience-

You're a spider trying to escape the dangers of the outside world. Don't stop or you'll be caught by those nasty kids! And don't crash into any walls along the way. Get to the safety of a bush as fast as possible!

The spider follows the mouse but you can't let it touch the cursor! Avoid the stone walls.

Made in 48 hours for the Spooky 2D jam.

Everything except music are made by me.

Lord & Master by Apashe

SFX Background - Eerie Ambience by ErikMMusic
